title: The Stranger Returns 1967 (Western movie) Tony Anthony, Daniele Vargas, Ettore Manni

sources.title: The Stranger Returns 1967 (Western movie) Tony Anthony, Daniele Vargas, Ettore Manni
sources.description:
Trap him! Tease him! Trample him! But watch out when the stranger gets mad!
A cynical gunfighter teams up with an elderly prophet to face off against a bandit gang vying for a solid gold stagecoach. The Stranger, aided by sharpshooter henchman and a deceitful postal agent, navigates a treacherous journey to secure the stolen gold. After being embroiled in a small town robbery, a stranger and his ally work together to take down the gang of robbers.

Original title: Un uomo, un cavallo, una pistola (1966) AKA: The Stranger Returns (USA) 
AKA:  Shoot First, Laugh Last (UK) | Western-Jack (Germany) | Skjuter först, skrattar sist (Sweden) | Un home, un cheval, un pistolet (France) | Un hombre, un caballo, una colt (Spain) | Son soz silahindir (Turkey) | Um Homem, Um Cavalo, Uma Pistola (Brazil) | Oi dyo simademenoi (Greece) | Oi skliroi tis Dysis (Greece) | Blutiger Dollar (The Netherlands) | Powrót nieznajomego (Poland) | Den Der Skyder først, ler sidst (Denmark)


This film is available with English & Spanish audio, and also subtitled in many language options.

Director: Luigi Vanzi
Writers: Tony Anthony, Roberto Infascelli, Giuseppe Mangione
Stars: Tony Anthony, Daniele Vargas, Ettore Manni
Genres: Italian cinema, Drama, Western
